Package org.jhipster.blog.web.rest

Class TagResource

java.lang.Object
org.jhipster.blog.web.rest.TagResource
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/tags") @Transactional public class TagResource extends Object
REST controller for managing Tag.

  • Method Details

    • createTag

      @PostMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Tag> createTag(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid Tag tag) throws URISyntaxException
      POST /tags : Create a new tag.
      Parameters:
      tag - the tag to create.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new tag, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the tag has already an ID.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect.

    • updateTag

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Tag> updateTag(@PathVariable(value="id",required=false) Long id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid Tag tag) throws URISyntaxException
      PUT /tags/:id : Updates an existing tag.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the tag to save.
      tag - the tag to update.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated tag, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the tag is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the tag couldn't be updated.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect.

    • partialUpdateTag

      @PatchMapping(value="/{id}", consumes={"application/json","application/merge-patch+json"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Tag> partialUpdateTag(@PathVariable(value="id",required=false) Long id, @NotNull @RequestBody @NotNull Tag tag) throws URISyntaxException
      PATCH /tags/:id : Partial updates given fields of an existing tag, field will ignore if it is null
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the tag to save.
      tag - the tag to update.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated tag, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the tag is not valid, or with status 404 (Not Found) if the tag is not found, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the tag couldn't be updated.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect.

    • getAllTags

      @GetMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Tag>> getAllTags(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      GET /tags : get all the tags.
      Parameters:
      pageable - the pagination information.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of tags in body.

    • getTag

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Tag> getTag(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      GET /tags/:id : get the "id" tag.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the tag to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the tag, or with status 404 (Not Found).

    • deleteTag

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteTag(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      DELETE /tags/:id : delete the "id" tag.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the tag to delete.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 204 (NO_CONTENT).
